item.description:
Hello Folks! HAPPY HOLIDAY!

Every year we get our entire Business Group Together and Celebrate the SUCCESS of our NSBSG!

Please come and join us and CELEBRATE! We have so much fun and Someone will be Awarded the " Sifu Award "! Might be you so make sure you are there!

Bring your favorite dish and spirits. This is also a Great Place to Bring your Family, That's right! Bring them so they can meet us, listen to our stories and hear our team success.

Simply told, it is a Social Events For Success, special holiday celebration for many of my business friends and a great way to network too. (You Must Be on the List to get in.)
item.how_to_find_us: Ready to have fun and Celebrate the New Year of Success!

group.name: The NorthShore Business Support Network meetup

item.name: Holiday Networking Party
